title: Autodesk Maya 2016 (Mac OS X) - AppzDam
description:
Maya 2016 delivers on so many levels. From the small changes that make your everyday workflow smoother, to the new and exciting tools that will introduce you to a new way of working. Maya 2016 helps make dealing with complexity, simple. One of the most powerful workstations that lets you create breathtaking environments, animations and effects with photo-realistic rendering.

Features :

The Maya Effect
With the Bifrost Procedural Effects Platform, XGen Arbitrary Primitive Generator technology and updates to the Bullet Physics plug-in, Maya 2015 is making a big splash in the world of VFX.

In with the new
With so much brand-new technology, Maya 2015 is a leap forward to a new way of working.

A solid foundation
With over 30 workflow changes and key updates to the core feature set - weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve done a lot of work in Maya 2015, making the tools you rely on even more robust, from the ground up.

Get Maya on Desktop Subscription
Want Maya? Now you can buy a perpetual license or pay as you go with a Desktop Subscription plan. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s your choice. Desktop Subscription plans give you access to a full-featured, commercial license of Maya, or an Entertainment Creation Suite, on a monthly, quarterly or annual basis. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a cost-effective choice to get the production-proven Maya tools you need for your next project. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s never been easier to get started with AutodeskÃ¢â‚¬Ëœs industry-leading 3D animation software, and Desktop Subscription plans are a great choice for freelance artists, independent studios, and startups that want to ramp up quickly and stay up to date.

Well-organized and visually appealing interface
This 3D modeling and animation solution comes with all the functions one would need to start a project from scratch or load an existing one to edit it. The interface is very well organized and balanced, even if comprises loads of buttons, menus and toolbars, not to mention that it is also highly customizable.

Comes equipped with powerful tools
Clearly designed for advanced users, Autodesk Maya packs an impressive array of tools, effects and controls. There are toolsets for 3D surface modeling as well as texturing, scene animation features and highly sophisticated effects are only a few of the assets this application brings to the table
